application.doc: Creating a certificate request in a certificate database

method.name: POST
method.doc: To complete this operation with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP POST command on the SSL Certificates certificate request resource URI. For the changes to take effect, they must be deployed

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: label
param.doc: The new certificate request label that is used to uniquely identify the personal certificate.

param.name: size
param.doc: The size of the new key pair to be created. Valid values are 1024, 2048 or 4096.

param.name: signature_algorithm
param.doc: The signature algorithm to use when creating the new certificate request.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
